com.premiumminds.billy.core.persistence.entities

Interface BusinessEntity

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseEntity, Business, Entity, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JPABusinessEntity

    public interface BusinessEntity
extends Business, BaseEntity
    Author:
    Francisco Vargas The definition of a Billy persistence business entity. A business is an owner of financial documents.
